unit_learning_outcomes.description: Ask questions and communicate problems relating to statistical models, and to explain and discuss ideas relating to implementation of statistical models.
Explain how a variety of statistical models are used in actuarial research and how empirical results are communicated in practice.
Use statistical software R to solve actuarial problems.
Understand the theoretical basis of a range of statistical models used in actuarial research and the practice of modelling and inference using statistical models.
Critique, replicate and extend basic actuarial research using statistical models.

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: Further article readings will form part of the learning resources to supplement lecture notes.
Preparation for seminar and various assessment items.

enrolment_rules.description: Admission to MActPrac and (STAT810 or STAT8310 or STAT806)

assessments.description: Assignment 2 consists of problem-solving questions requiring detailed solutions
Assignment 1 consists of objective response questions requiring explanations in appropriate words and/or mathematical expressions.
Assignment 3 consists of problem-solving questions requiring detailed solutions including numerical solutions using statistical software R.

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 1, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 1, Special circumstances

academic_org.value: Department of Actuarial Studies and Business Analytics

data.description: This unit focuses on statistical approaches for research in Business and Economics and related disciplines. Topics include a range of probability and statistical models, their theoretical basis, the assessment and evaluation of the models, and methods of statistical inference for data analysis. The unit will also consider applications of the above models and techniques to the actuarial practice discipline.
data.title: Quantitative Research Methods

description: This unit focuses on statistical approaches for research in Business and Economics and related disciplines. title: Quantitative Research Methods
